title: Load the Last Container on a Vessel
description: Cargo operations are nearly complete. The foreman must supervise the loading of the final container and hatch cover.

tasks.description: Confirm with the crane operator and vessel crew that the last container is ready to be loaded.
tasks.expected_outcome: All parties confirm they are ready for the final move.

tasks.description: Oversee the loading of the final container.
tasks.expected_outcome: The container is safely loaded onto the vessel.

tasks.description: Instruct the crane operator to lift the hatch covers back onto the vessel and then boom up the crane.
tasks.expected_outcome: Hatch covers are replaced, the crane booms up, and the foreman declares 'operations complete' for that vessel.
